sourcesContent: import React, { useState } from 'react' import useGlobalContext from "../../Global"; import {ReactComponent as Logo} from "../../assets/logo.svg" import {ReactComponent as SearchIcon} from "../../assets/search.svg" import {ReactComponent as UserIcon} from "../../assets/user.svg" import {ReactComponent as CartIcon} from "../../assets/cart.svg" import {ReactComponent as MenuIcon} from "../../assets/icon-menu.svg" import * as S from "./styles" export default function Header() { const { amount } = useGlobalContext() const [showMobileMenuItems, setShowMobileMenuItems] = useState(false) const mobileMenuToggle = () => { setShowMobileMenuItems(prevState => !prevState) } return ( Minha Conta Minha Conta {amount} ) }
